welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cuernavaca, Mexico! Discover the city's rich history, beautiful gardens, and vibrant culture as you explore its charming streets and local attractions. Enjoy your time in this enchanting destination.

restaurants.address: Las Casas 110 (Blvd. Benito Juarez), 62000 Cuernavaca, Morelos
